title: Internal compiler error assertion failed: `(left == right)` on nightly and beta

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
This code

```rust
macro_rules! m {
    () => {{
        fn f(_: impl Sized) {}
        f
    }}
}

fn main() {
    fn f() -> impl Sized {};
    m!()(f());
}
```

triggers this ICE with rustc 1.29.0-beta.2 (ea82e08ee 2018-08-05) but compiles fine with current stable 1.28.0:

```
   Compiling playground v0.0.1 (file:///playground)
thread 'main' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`
  left: `fn(impl) {main::f::<impl>}`,
 right: `fn(()) {main::f::<()>}`', librustc_mir/transform/const_prop.rs:338:17
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
             at libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:49
   1: std::sys_common::backtrace::print
             at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:71
             at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59
   2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
             at libstd/panicking.rs:211
   3: std::panicking::default_hook
             at libstd/panicking.rs:227

             at libstd/panicking.rs:479

  29: rustc::ty::query::plumbing::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'gcx, 'tcx>>::get_query
  30: <rustc_codegen_llvm::LlvmCodegenBackend as rustc_codegen_utils::codegen_backend::CodegenBackend>::codegen_crate

             at libpanic_unwind/lib.rs:105

  47: std::panicking::try::do_call
             at libstd/rt.rs:59

#0 [optimized_mir] processing `main`

end of query stack

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.29.0-beta.2 (ea82e08ee 2018-08-05) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type bin

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

error: Could not compile `playground`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```
